javadoc: Command for editing and removing comments at an address.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct command for setting all the different types of comments at an
 address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of code unit where comment will edited

methods.javadoc: The name of the edit action.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: The name of the edit action.

methods.name: createComment
methods.comment: Creates the specified comment of the specified type at address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address where data is created

params.name: commentType
params.comment:
the type of comment (CodeUnit#PLATE_COMMENT, 
 CodeUnit#PRE_COMMENT, CodeUnit#EOL_COMMENT, CodeUnit#POST_COMMENT,
 CodeUnit#REPEATABLE_COMMENT)

name: SetCommentsCmd
comment: Command for editing and removing comments at an address.
